sQuestion: Mary found 2 seashells and Keith found 5 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 9 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Mike picked 8 pears and Jason picked 7 pears from the pear tree . Fred picked 6 apples from the apple tree . How many pears were picked in total ?
Tim had 7 quarters and 9 nickels in his bank . His dad gave him 3 nickels and 5 pennies . How many nickels does Tim have now ?
A restaurant served 7 slices of pie during lunch and 5 during dinner today . It served 8 of them yesterday . How many slices of pie were served today ?
Tom went to 4 hockey games this year , but missed 7 . He went to 9 games last year . How many hockey games did Tom go to in all ?
Sam 's dog had puppies and 8 had spots . He gave 2 to his friends . He now has 6 puppies . How many puppies did he have to start with ?
Mike picked 7 apples , Nancy picked 3 apples , and Keith picked 6 apples and 4 pears , at the farm . How many apples were picked in total ?

There are 7 dogwood trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 5 dogwood trees today and 4 dogwood trees tomorrow . It took 8 workers to finish the work . How many dogwood trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Dan 's cat had kittens and 5 had spots . He gave 7 to Tim and 4 to Jason . He now has 5 kittens . How many kittens did he have to start with ?
There are 7 crayons in the drawer and 6 crayons on the desk . Sam placed 4 crayons and 8 scissors on the desk . How many crayons are now there in total ?
